title: Himi 32
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Eiki ‘oku lahi faufau
‘A ho tokanga’i
‘A e kakai angahala
‘Oku tu’utāmaki.
2.
Na’e hekasia Koe
Ki he funga ‘akau,
Ko e siofia ‘anga
Ki he kakai hia.
3.
Na’e Ke mafao atu
‘A ho ongo nima
Mo ho va’e ‘i ‘olunga
Pea tuki fa’o.
4.
Ko hono faka’ilonga
‘O ho ‘ofa lahi,
Ki he kakai angahala
Ke nau mo’ui ai.
5.
Pea ko ho vakavaka
Ko e fauniteni
‘Oku ‘ata’atāina
Ki he fie inu.
6.
Ko ho finangalo ‘ofa
Ki he angahala
Ke nau liliu pea hao
‘I ho ta’ata’a. *
